docs.title: Homepage
docs.text: Here you can find all the documentation/ notes of all my work.

docs.title: Contents
docs.text: Page Name Content Custom-Python-Library Custom methods integrating famous and frequently used libraries.

docs.title: Custom Python Library
docs.text: Custom methods integrating famous and frequently used libraries.

docs.title: timestamp_to_date(dataframe)
docs.text: Method converts all datetime column to date datatype. input : dataframe: A dataframe which needs datetime operation. returns: dataframe: Converted dataframe after datetime to date operation.

docs.title: timestamp_to_date_column(column : str, dataframe)
docs.text: Method converts datetime column to date datatype. input : dataframe: A dataframe which needs datetime operation. column: A column name which needs datetime operation. returns: dataframe: Converted dataframe after datetime to date operation.

docs.title: get_dataframe(Workbook: str, Sheet: str)
docs.text: Method loads excel sheet data into panda dataframe. input : Workbook: Excel workbook path + filename. Sheet: Excel workbook sheet name returns: dataframe: dataframe from data extracted from sheet in workbook.

docs.title: append_dataframe_wo_password(Workbook: str, Sheet: str, dataframe)
docs.text: Method to append dataframe data to unprotected excel sheet. input : Workbook: Excel workbook path + filename. Sheet: Excel workbook sheet name datframe: Dataframe to append returns: None

docs.title: delete_sheet(Workbook: str, Sheet: str)
docs.text: Method to delete excel sheet from workbook. input : Workbook: Excel workbook path + filename. Sheet: Excel workbook sheet name returns: None

docs.title: create_sheet(Workbook: str, Sheet: str)
docs.text: Method to create sheet in excel workbook. input : Workbook: Excel workbook path + filename. Sheet: Excel workbook sheet name returns: None

docs.title: overwrite_sheet(Workbook: str, Sheet: str, dataframe)
docs.text: Method to overwrite excel sheet contents. input : Workbook: Excel workbook path + filename. Sheet: Excel workbook sheet name datframe: Dataframe to overwrite returns: None

docs.title: reposition_sheet(Workbook: str, Sheet: str)
docs.text: Method to reposition excel sheet to first position. input : Workbook: Excel workbook path + filename. Sheet: Excel workbook sheet name returns: None

docs.title: append_dataframe_w_password(Workbook: str, Sheet: str, Password: str, df)
docs.text: Method to append dataframe to password protected excel sheet. input : Workbook: Excel workbook path + filename. Sheet: Excel workbook sheet name Password: Sheet password datframe: Dataframe to overwrite returns: None

docs.title: remove_password_sheet(Workbook: str, Sheet: str)
docs.text: Method to remove password from protected sheet. input : Workbook: Excel workbook path + filename. Sheet: Excel workbook sheet name returns: None

docs.title: add_sheet_password(Workbook: str, Sheet: str, Password: str)
docs.text: Method to create password protected sheet. input : Workbook: Excel workbook path + filename. Sheet: Excel workbook sheet name Password: Sheet password returns: None
